vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.38.2;
father of: Bath-shua (H1323I)
Also named: shu.a (שׁוּעָא "Shua" H7774H)
§ Shuah = "wealth"
father of Judah's wife
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   padre de la esposa de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
書亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "財富"
猶大妻子的父親(創 38:2)(創 38:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
书亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "财富"
犹大妻子的父亲(创 38:2)(创 38:12)
